scripts.i18n:pot: php -d xdebug.max_nesting_level=512 $(which wp) i18n make-pot --exclude="node_modules/,languages/,assets/" --headers='{"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://woocommerce.com/my-account/create-a-ticket/", "language-team":"LANGUAGE <EMAIL@ADDRESS>"}' . languages/woocommerce-gateway-dummy.pot
